93c6f25d-3452-417a-915a-52d1bf59e8fe.description: This badge is issued after completing the Excel - Level 2 1 day course. The skills and knowledge acquired in Microsoft Excel 2016 - Level 2 enable users to expand their knowledge and learn how to create more productive workbooks. It covers formulas and function techniques, advanced formatting and charting features and pivoting data using Pivot Tables.
93c6f25d-3452-417a-915a-52d1bf59e8fe.name: EXCEL 2016 - LEVEL 2

caca8c1f-5d0c-4a90-83cb-c7a45e532211.description: This badge is issued after completing the Excel - Level 1 1 day course. This is a beginner’s course and aims to give the new spreadsheet user a thorough grounding in the basics of creating and working with spreadsheets using Microsoft Excel 2016. Particular emphasis is placed on developing accurate and well-designed spreadsheets employing sound design and documentation principles.
caca8c1f-5d0c-4a90-83cb-c7a45e532211.name: EXCEL 2016 - LEVEL 1

1627ecdb-55dc-4e67-a616-7d310055a16b.description: This badge is issued after completing the Excel - Level 3 1 day course. The skills and knowledge acquired in Microsoft Excel 2016 - Level 3 are sufficient to be able to work with multiple worksheets and workbooks, lookup functions, share workbook, protect worksheet data, automate workbook functionality, macros, mapping data and forecasting data.
1627ecdb-55dc-4e67-a616-7d310055a16b.name: EXCEL 2016 - LEVEL 3

40a9f620-cb06-4fdd-a362-1b827906dab5.description: This badge is issued after completing the 55238 - SharePoint Online for Administrators 3-day course.

bdb7f0af-0f0d-4d0e-bf43-8dd5fb5f4139.description: Microsoft Power BI is a collection of software services, apps, and connectors that work together to turn your unrelated sources of data into coherent, visually immersive, and interactive insights. Whether your data is a simple Microsoft Excel workbook, or a collection of cloud-based and on-premises hybrid data warehouses, Power BI lets you easily connect to your data sources, visualize (or discover) what's important, and share that with anyone or everyone you want.
bdb7f0af-0f0d-4d0e-bf43-8dd5fb5f4139.name: POWER BI INTERMEDIATE

2eb92a25-bc75-45a1-be85-8de70f6fb3a3.description: This badge is issued after completing the AZ-104T00 - Microsoft Azure Administrator 4-day course. This course teaches IT Professionals how to manage their Azure subscriptions, secure identities, administer the infrastructure, configure virtual networking, connect Azure and on-premises sites, manage network traffic, implement storage solutions, create and scale virtual machines, implement web apps and containers, back up and share data, and monitor your solution.
2eb92a25-bc75-45a1-be85-8de70f6fb3a3.name: AZ-104T00 - MICROSOFT AZURE ADMINISTRATOR

73458dff-3c50-4ae0-952c-67e5c5a82c3b.description: This badge is issued after completing the Project 2 day course. The course extends to teaching the skills and knowledge beyond the creation of simple projects.

8a9c934d-3ef2-414f-a783-514c44a0d6ed.description: This course teaches participants the fundamentals of customer service in both face-to-face and telephone settings. You will learn how to create positive customer experiences that help to build customer loyalty, through your behaviour and choice of words. You will also develop the skills to deal with challenging customers and situations. The manual is designed for quick scanning in the classroom and filled with interactive exercises that help ensure your success.
8a9c934d-3ef2-414f-a783-514c44a0d6ed.name: Excellence in Service

9d2cad65-674f-420e-a518-b7e175732a17.description: The Team Leadership Program is a 1 day program and teaches participants how to be an effective team leader. You learn how to communicate effectively, adapt to various personality issues and overcome common problems. Further, you will work on aspects of verbal and non-verbal communication, create a supportive team environment, motivate individuals, the sources of team conflict and different conflict resolution strategies.
9d2cad65-674f-420e-a518-b7e175732a17.name: Team Leadership

b5dffcc2-d95b-4d1b-ba5c-4898908c87c3.description: This badge is issued after completing the Visio Professional 1 day course. b5dffcc2-d95b-4d1b-ba5c-4898908c87c3.name: VISIO PROFESSIONAL

562a0ba6-c723-45a2-ab17-300259e7e0fb.description: This badge is issued after completing the Word - Level 3 1 day course. The This course aims to enhance existing skills by covering more specific documentation creation aspects such as manipulating images, using custom graphic elements, collaborating on document, adding document reference and links, securing documents and automating repetitive tasks with macros.
562a0ba6-c723-45a2-ab17-300259e7e0fb.name: WORD 2016 - LEVEL 3

54667ab9-5a8d-4d1e-81b1-a4b51b85e1a3.description: This badge is issued after completing the AZ-500T00: Microsoft Azure Security Technologies 4 day course. This course provides IT Security Professionals with the knowledge and skills needed to implement security controls, maintain an organization’s security posture, and identify and remediate security vulnerabilities. This course includes security for identity and access, platform protection, data and applications, and security operations.
54667ab9-5a8d-4d1e-81b1-a4b51b85e1a3.name: AZ-500T00: MICROSOFT AZURE SECURITY TECHNOLOGIES

This course will provide foundational level knowledge on Azure concepts; core Azure services; core solutions and management tools; general security and network security; governance, privacy, and compliance features; Azure cost management and service level agreements.
76734459-f2d1-4dfc-854a-bb02519400f0.name: AZ-900T01-A: MICROSOFT AZURE FUNDAMENTALS

70200960-c172-493d-bd3f-97dc961ee77b.description: This course teaches participants about the fundamentals of interpersonal communication styles and techniques. Participants learn the foundations of assertive communications, how to build rapport, how to ask and answer questions, use nonverbal communication, give feedback, and deal with push back. The manual is designed for quick scanning in the classroom and filled with interactive exercises that help ensure participant success.
70200960-c172-493d-bd3f-97dc961ee77b.name: Essential Communication Skills

e1cb3e68-f578-4e40-bd97-e537f92af28e.description: Most people get promoted to the position of People Manager based on their technical expertise but managing people calls upon a completely different set of skills. Because of this, surviving as a new manager can be difficult. 40% of managers new to a role don't survive in the role beyond 18 months*.At best a novice manager without training can just be ineffectual; at worst, they can create detrimental precedents that are hard to manage out of staff. They can also create conflict and demotivation
e1cb3e68-f578-4e40-bd97-e537f92af28e.name: The New Manager

238f81c9-b6e9-420b-9e9e-8179681765ae.description: This badge is issued after completing the Word - Level 1 1 day course. Microsoft Word 2016 - Level 1 course aims to give the learner a sound grounding in the use of Microsoft Word 2016 to create everyday documents required either at work or at home. Particular emphasis is placed on developing accurate and well-designed documents. Learner will create a new document learn about formatting text and paragraphs, document proofing, controlling page appearance and viewing and printing documents.
238f81c9-b6e9-420b-9e9e-8179681765ae.name: WORD 2016 - LEVEL 1

20e24f50-f6bb-4415-931b-d8aff3c251a8.description: This badge is issued after completing the Word - Level 2 1 day course. 20e24f50-f6bb-4415-931b-d8aff3c251a8.name: WORD 2016 - LEVEL 2

d9dd88d1-d98b-4658-8795-5082b30915ba.description: This course delivers an instructor-led product showcase for Microsoft Power Automate from start to finish in an engaging and practical way. Power Automate is a diverse product, turning business processes into automated, consistent and visual workflows. Power Automate is designed to interweave the various products in Office 365 as well as connect to other on-premises and web-based solutions. This course will give you the confidence to select the right actions and workflow logic for your business
d9dd88d1-d98b-4658-8795-5082b30915ba.name: 55268 - Microsoft Power Automate for End Users

9d4856bf-cb91-44b0-8c45-1ecef9d5a516.description: This badge is issued after completing the Adobe InDesign CC - Level 1 1 day course. This course covers the Print & Digital Media Publication Using Adobe InDesign CC objectives to help students prepare for the Adobe Certified Associate (ACA) exam. This course is also designed to cover the Adobe Certified Expert (ACE) exam objectives.
9d4856bf-cb91-44b0-8c45-1ecef9d5a516.name: ADOBE INDESIGN CC - LEVEL 1

This course teaches developers how to create end-to-end solutions in Microsoft Azure. Students will learn how to implement Azure compute solutions, create Azure Functions, implement and manage web apps, develop solutions utilizing Azure storage, implement authentication and authorization, and secure their solutions by using KeyVault and Managed Identities.

This course provides the knowledge and skills to design and implement DevOps processes and practices. Students will learn how to plan for DevOps, use source control, scale Git for an enterprise, consolidate artifacts, design a dependency management strategy, manage secrets, implement continuous integration, implement a container build strategy and more.
24827cba-048f-4333-9785-11a653cefe12.name: AZ-400T00: DESIGNING AND IMPLEMENTING MICROSOFT DEVOPS SOLUTIONS

c592fb81-0c5c-45eb-8b46-f2e74c07b59e.name: Project Management Fundamentals

0f0eeb34-6a2f-43a9-a413-d0510e462b93.description: This course provides an introduction to HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. This course helps students gain basic HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript programming skills. This course is an entry point into both the Web application and Windows Store apps training paths. The course focuses on using HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript to implement programming logic, define and use variables, perform looping and branching, develop user interfaces, capture and validate user input, store data, and create well-structured application.
0f0eeb34-6a2f-43a9-a413-d0510e462b93.name: 20480C PROGRAMMING IN HTML5 WITH JAVASCRIPT & CSS3

01534ecf-e034-455d-92f0-fa379956b666.name: ADOBE PHOTOSHOP CC - LEVEL 1

717c5162-3318-4a8b-9db4-094807c25bdb.description: This badge is issued after completing the Adobe Photoshop CC - Level 2 1 day course. 717c5162-3318-4a8b-9db4-094807c25bdb.name: ADOBE PHOTOSHOP CC - LEVEL 2

5b0a68e2-944a-451b-8685-6cfb7309bd8b.description: You will be able to develop and maintain a sense of rapport so rapidly that people you meet for the first time will treat you like a long-lost friend without knowing why. As rapport is the foundation for great communication, you will have created a solid base to begin to achieve your outcome. You will learn how to overcome objections to any statement you make and redirect the mind of the people you communicate with to the objectives you have in mind.
5b0a68e2-944a-451b-8685-6cfb7309bd8b.name: ADVANCED COMMUNICATION SKILLS

0998130a-b8ad-44cb-9fec-f3c5b40451f3.description: This badge is issued after completing the AZ-304T00: Microsoft Azure Architect Design 4 day course. This course teaches Solutions Architects to translate business requirements into secure, scalable, and reliable solutions.
0998130a-b8ad-44cb-9fec-f3c5b40451f3.name: AZ-304T00: MICROSOFT AZURE ARCHITECT DESIGN

d2a2a59d-373c-4161-993c-8f6b1a2dc4f1.description: This course teaches participants how to develop the skills to proactively address change and meet the challenges of transition in the workplace. You will work with various employee personalities to overcome the problems encountered when making changes in your organisation. You will also learn how to develop the ability to effectively handle organisational changes by examining the transition process and understanding their own, and others', needs and responses to each phase.
d2a2a59d-373c-4161-993c-8f6b1a2dc4f1.name: Change Management

ccaff5d3-1d29-40e9-9c6e-fad1120401c6.description: This badge is issued after completing the DP-080T00: Querying Data with Transact-SQL 2 day course. This course will teach the basics of Microsoft's dialect of the standard SQL language: Transact-SQL. Topics include both querying and modifying data in relational databases that are hosted in Microsoft SQL Server-based database systems, including: Microsoft SQL Server, Azure SQL Database and, Azure Synapse Analytics.
ccaff5d3-1d29-40e9-9c6e-fad1120401c6.name: DP-080T00: QUERYING DATA WITH TRANSACT-SQL

71aab7aa-0ab1-47a5-81b8-af3b8ee7d32d.description: All of us need to influence or persuade someone at some stage in life. In the workplace, influence and persuasion skills are everyday necessities; crucial to achieving business outcomes. Without good influencing techniques managers use force and coercion, team members can get into conflict and lower productivity and sales, and customer service staff can lose customers. Through this workshop, you will begin to demystify the behaviours of great influencers.
71aab7aa-0ab1-47a5-81b8-af3b8ee7d32d.name: Effective Influencing and Persuasion

f4649161-004c-497e-b481-40c26728c6ac.description: The Effective Negotiator Program teaches participants the basics of negotiations. You will learn the basic types of negotiation and how to use negotiation processes in multiple situations. You will be able to articulate the phases required for success and learn the concepts WATNA, BATNA, WAP and ZOPA, their importance to a negotiation and how to apply them. You will be able to complete the groundwork for a negotiation and identify what information to share and what not to.
f4649161-004c-497e-b481-40c26728c6ac.name: Effective Negotiator

b844f9ff-74ee-4a21-88d3-12adc9f0d6cb.description: Emotional intelligence, also called EQ, is the ability to be aware of and to manage emotions and relationships. It's a pivotal factor in personal and professional success. IQ will get you in the door, but it is your EQ, your ability to connect with others and manage the emotions of yourself and others, that will determine how successful you are in life.We have all worked with and listened to brilliant people. Some of them were great and well, some were not so great. The mean and the meek and a
b844f9ff-74ee-4a21-88d3-12adc9f0d6cb.name: Emotional Intelligence

The course will cover Teams Phone with Calling Plans, Direct Routing, and Operator Connect, in addition to Teams devices, audio/video conferencing, and voice migration. Students will learn troubleshooting methodologies and how to resolve common telephony and voice problems.
2bee4c64-2484-4433-bf24-773122fcf6da.name: MS-720T00 MICROSOFT TEAMS VOICE ENGINEER

In this course, you will use Adobe Acrobat XI Pro to convert technical documents to PDF files, enhance PDF documents, create interactive PDF forms, and prepare and PDF files for commercial printing.
72031eaf-126e-417f-b7c6-7659a4a2e98b.name: ADOBE ACROBAT XI PRO - LEVEL 2

skills.name: Prepare PDF Files for Commercial Printing

591fc0aa-6770-4f50-b4c7-8eede4973315.description: To meet the demands of individuals and organisations for flexible, reusable, and easily modified visual content, Adobe Systems has created a cadre of applications that collectively provide a scalable, end-to-end solution for nearly every type of visual design project one can contemplate. Called Creative Cloud (CC), the collection of applications perform specialised design tasks while interoperating among each other to deliver superlative content.
591fc0aa-6770-4f50-b4c7-8eede4973315.name: Adobe Illustrator CC - Level 1

e0510f61-3de3-43ef-8f49-eaba049ef079.description: This badge is issued after completing the AZ-303T00: Microsoft Azure Architect Technologies 5 day course. This course teaches Solutions Architects how to translate business requirements into secure, scalable, and reliable solutions. Lessons include virtualization, automation, networking, storage, identity, security, data platform, and application infrastructure. This course outlines how decisions in each theses area affects an overall solution.
e0510f61-3de3-43ef-8f49-eaba049ef079.name: AZ-303T00: MICROSOFT AZURE ARCHITECT TECHNOLOGIES

27ec7c20-a1b3-47b9-8c0e-3f4da755ee9f.description: This badge is issued after completing the AZ-900T00 - Microsoft Azure Fundamentals 2 day course. This course will provide foundational level knowledge on Azure concepts; core Azure services; core solutions and management tools; general security and network security; governance, privacy, and compliance features; Azure cost management and service level agreements.
27ec7c20-a1b3-47b9-8c0e-3f4da755ee9f.name: AZ-900T00 - MICROSOFT AZURE FUNDAMENTALS

b77718d4-f100-42f6-838d-10b231e2baa8.description: Time Management is a misnomer. Individuals need to effectively organise 'themselves' within a given time period in order to gain greater productivity and minimise stress. This course teaches participants the fundamentals of time management. You will learn how to prioritise, plan and organise your workload and understand the elements that will sabotage your progress. Further, you will learn tips and tricks to more effectively manage your e-mail, the telephone, meetings and personal interactions.
b77718d4-f100-42f6-838d-10b231e2baa8.name: Effective Time Management

bbb55ee3-b317-43b9-a5bf-fd10cab1f0a4.description: This course builds on the skills taught in our Excellence in Service Basics course. The Advanced course is aimed at people who manage service teams, as it focuses on the measurement, improvement and management of service standards and outcomes. Participants will learn how to determine what customers want, and evaluate the service provided. Participants will also learn how to create, implement, and monitor service standards. Program activities also cover conducting interviews, training and empowe
bbb55ee3-b317-43b9-a5bf-fd10cab1f0a4.name: Excellence in Service - Advanced

de7fbefd-9abe-4be6-b909-a89ea8b2b18a.description: This course teaches participants the fundamentals of customer service in both face-to-face and telephone settings. You will learn how to create positive customer experiences that help to build customer loyalty, through your behaviour and choice of words. You will also develop the skills to deal with challenging customers and situations. The manual is designed for quick scanning in the classroom and filled with interactive exercises that help ensure your success.
de7fbefd-9abe-4be6-b909-a89ea8b2b18a.name: Excellence in Service - Essentials

e557c8bd-948f-415b-90a4-d4211e035f49.description: This course teaches participants techniques to deal with difficult customers and staff members in a positive and assertive way.
e557c8bd-948f-415b-90a4-d4211e035f49.name: How to Handle Difficult People

8c5ee6f6-52e9-4ddd-8ec5-274ee1835ab3.description: ITIL® 4 is an essential course that is built on the established core of best practice in the ITIL® guidance. By doing this course you can earn the ITIL® 4 Foundation Certificate in IT Service Management! ITIL® 4 is a global certification, recognised in any country. ITIL® is the most widely adopted approach for IT Service Management in the world. ITIL® 4 provides a practical and flexible approach to move to the new world of digital transformation.
8c5ee6f6-52e9-4ddd-8ec5-274ee1835ab3.name: ITIL® 4 Foundation

bd84a1f1-b6a6-4395-917a-ce3fead4949e.description: This badge is issued after completing the ITIL® 4 Foundation Certificate In IT Service Management 2 day course.
bd84a1f1-b6a6-4395-917a-ce3fead4949e.name: ITIL® 4 FOUNDATION CERTIFICATE IN IT SERVICE MANAGEMENT

661c8394-d9cf-429e-9a56-af94f0091bc1.description: This badge is issued after completing the MB-220T00: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Marketing 4 day course. This course will review the marketing application configuration needed to drive business growth. It will also dive into lead management, marketing forms and pages, segmentation, and email marketing messages. All these pieces are tied together through interactive customer journey design, including event and survey configuration.
661c8394-d9cf-429e-9a56-af94f0091bc1.name: MB-220T00: MICROSOFT DYNAMICS 365 MARKETING

53ec2494-e5dc-4309-9578-0d488a8d4e9f.description: This badge is issued after completing the MB-330T00: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management 4 day course. This course discusses supply chain management in the Dynamics 365 suite of apps.
53ec2494-e5dc-4309-9578-0d488a8d4e9f.name: MB-330T00: MICROSOFT DYNAMICS 365 SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT

ae107124-8c96-404c-a819-e46675b9cd80.description: This badge is issued after completing the MB-920T00 - Microsoft Dynamics 365 Fundamentals 2 day course. This course provides learners with a broad overview of Dynamics 365 applications. We will introduce you each of the applications, articulate their business value, and discuss and demo core functionality. We will cover Dynamics 365 security, reporting, and familiarize you with data and product integrations available.
ae107124-8c96-404c-a819-e46675b9cd80.name: MB-920T00: MICROSOFT DYNAMICS 365 FUNDAMENTALS (ERP)

86da3cb0-b753-43e2-8291-fa1f7c2a7af4.description: This badge is issued after completing the MD-100T00: Windows 10 5 day course.
86da3cb0-b753-43e2-8291-fa1f7c2a7af4.name: MD-100T00: WINDOWS 10

f0721520-f200-462f-b5c9-416e07698ed2.description: This badge is issued after completing the MS-101T00 Microsoft 365 Mobility and Security 5 day course.
f0721520-f200-462f-b5c9-416e07698ed2.name: MS-101T00 MICROSOFT 365 MOBILITY AND SECURITY

51518064-0fe4-4c64-944d-7679897e9701.description: This course covers five central elements of Microsoft 365 platform – implementing Microsoft Identity, working with Microsoft Graph, extending and customizing SharePoint, extending Teams, and extending Office.
51518064-0fe4-4c64-944d-7679897e9701.name: MS-600T00 - BUILDING APPLICATIONS AND SOLUTIONS WITH MICROSOFT 365 CORE SERVICES

3e5ed24f-616b-4272-93ff-828c773ff930.description: This three day Foundation course will provide you with a sound understanding of the PRINCE2® components and process model and will prepare you for sitting the PRINCE2® Foundation Exam (1 hour multi-choice) at the end of the course. PRINCE2® is a registered trade mark of AXELOS Limited, used under permission of AXELOS Limited. All rights reserved.
3e5ed24f-616b-4272-93ff-828c773ff930.name: PRINCE2 Foundation

d08d6bc4-761e-447a-9543-2903bb0a3fc2.description: NextTech offers a package for those wishing to progress to PRINCE2® Practitioner Level and can be used regardless of which pathway the delegate chooses. The package includes the Foundation Syllabus, Foundation Exam, Practitioner Syllabus, Exam Preparation, Practitioner Exam and a copy of the PRINCE2® Manual.
d08d6bc4-761e-447a-9543-2903bb0a3fc2.name: PRINCE2 Practitioner Package

629314c9-5b17-4649-b608-6ab034d36d23.description: Strengthen and build telephone communication skills so that the opportunities arising from inquiries, service and sales calls are maximised.
629314c9-5b17-4649-b608-6ab034d36d23.name: Professional Telephone Skills

3aaa37c9-5efb-4e72-99bc-fec960a6ed56.name: Publisher 2016/2019

5230c0af-14c2-4e09-85c0-44ef8eb4165e.description: Learn how to investigate, respond to, and hunt for threats using Microsoft Sentinel, Microsoft Defender for Cloud, and Microsoft 365 Defender. In this course you will learn how to mitigate cyberthreats using these technologies. Specifically, you will configure and use Microsoft Sentinel as well as utilize Kusto Query Language (KQL) to perform detection, analysis, and reporting. The course was designed for people who work in a Security Operations job role and helps learners prepare for the exam S
5230c0af-14c2-4e09-85c0-44ef8eb4165e.name: SC-200T00-A Microsoft Security Operations Analyst

ee68967e-43f3-40ac-bd20-fb1c1e6eca1b.description: This badge is issued after completing the Time Management using Outlook 1 day course. This course will show you proven time management strategies to better organize your time. The skills and knowledge acquired are sufficient to be able to manage and organise your e-mail, schedule meetings with colleagues, manage your contact information, create task requests for others to perform and much more.
ee68967e-43f3-40ac-bd20-fb1c1e6eca1b.name: TIME MANAGEMENT USING OUTLOOK

18201b5c-3c22-4ce0-8718-1bf4f54a5fdd.description: Train the Trainer is a component of continuous professional career development for those aspiring to supervisory/management positions or who hold leadership positions, where training is a vital competence. This course is often seen as a stepping stone towards enhancing a career in the field of training, learning and development, Human Resources, as well as supervisory and management roles. This course provides for an introduction to the general principles of learning and development.
18201b5c-3c22-4ce0-8718-1bf4f54a5fdd.name: TRAIN THE TRAINER
